my.organization-pets.PetType.title: Pet Type
my.organization-pets.PetType.description: Identifies the type of pet shown in photo.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this entity.  Must be 256 characters or less.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of this entity.  Must be 1000 characters or less.

id.description: The unique immutable ID for this entity.  A new ID will be generated for new Entities.  Once issued, this ID is guaranteed to never change or be re-issued

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

createdOn.title: Created On
createdOn.description: The date this entity was created.

modifiedOn.title: Modified On
modifiedOn.description: The date this entity was last modified.

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this entity.

modifiedBy.title: Modified By
modifiedBy.description: The ID of the user that last modified this entity.

parentId.description: The ID of the Entity that is the parent of this Entity.

org.sagebionetworks-repo.model.Entity.description: This is the base interface that all Entities implement.

versionNumber.description: The version number issued to this version on the object.

versionLabel.title: Version
versionLabel.description: The version label for this entity

versionComment.title: Version Comment
versionComment.description: The version comment for this entity

dataFileHandleId.description: ID of the file associated with this entity.

fileNameOverride.description: An optional replacement for the name of the uploaded file.  This is distinct from the entity name.  If omitted the file will retain its original name.

petName.description: The name of the pet shown in the photo.

birthday.description: The birthday of the pet shown in the photo.
